page.title: 13Housing in Ryhope
page.content: We looked at the{houses}in our area very closely. They are mainly {semi-detached,}some built recently on private estates but most are{council {houses}dating from the 1950's. We also saw a lot of{terraced}houses, some going back to as early as 1900. We discovered that most are heated by either{solid fuel}or{gas central {heating}but it was interesting that many house-holders who use coal would like to change to central heating. Most people said they liked their homes and their streets but they still thought they could be improved. Some said they would like{cleaner, {litter-free streets}with wider roads while others wanted patio doors and front porches as well as more garages so that cars did not have to be parked on pavements.
